original: ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi bde ba de'i bdag nyid dang / dmigs pa dang bral ba /

original: thugs rje chen pos mnyes gshin pa /

original: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi khyams kyi dbus na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje 'dug pa la gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad do //

analyzed: slob dpon mtshan nyid bshad par bya //
translated: Now I will explain the characteristics of the master.

original: ye shes snying po khyod nyon cig /🔽brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan //
analyzed: ye shes snying po khyod nyon cig / brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan //
translated: Listen, O Jñānagarbha!🔽He is steadfast, disciplined, and intelligent,

original: bzod ldan drang zhing g-yo sgyu med //
analyzed: bzod ldan drang zhing g-yo sgyu med //
translated: patient, honest, and without deceit,

original: gsang sngags rgyud kyi sbyor shes pas //
analyzed: gsang sngags rgyud kyi sbyor shes pas //
translated: and knows the application of the tantra of secret mantra.

original: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las bya'o //
translated: He should perform the activity of drawing the maṇḍala.

original: de nyid bcu ni yongs shes shing //
analyzed: de nyid bcu ni yongs shes shing //
translated: Fully understanding the ten principles,

original: sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin //
analyzed: sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin //
translated: he grants fearlessness to all sentient beings,

original: theg pa che la rtag dga' ba //
analyzed: theg pa che la rtag dga' ba //
translated: always delights in the Mahāyāna,

original: de ni slob dpon yin par gsungs //
analyzed: de ni slob dpon yin par gsungs //
translated: and is said to be the master.

original: phyi rol bstan bcos yongs shes shing //
analyzed: phyi rol bstan bcos yongs shes shing //
translated: Fully understanding the external treatises,🔽the path of the śrāvakas,🔽the collection of the secret principles,

original: nyan thos rnams kyi lam 'gro dang // gsang ba de nyid bsdu ba dang // theg pa chen po mi shes pa //
analyzed: nyan thos rnams kyi lam 'gro dang // gsang ba de nyid bsdu ba dang // theg pa chen po mi shes pa //

analyzed: snying rje yod pa ma yin dang // dad med brtson 'grus mi ldan la //

original: rtag tu ngan pa'i tshul spyod dang // bstan bcos rnams la smod pa min //
analyzed: rtag tu ngan pa'i tshul spyod dang // bstan bcos rnams la smod pa min //
translated: or disparage the treatises.🔽If one possesses the characteristics taught above,

analyzed: gong du bstan pa'i mtshan nyid dang // ldan na slob dpon yin par gzung //

analyzed: de yis dkyil 'khor bri ba dang // de nyid kyis ni rgyud rnams @289a *//

analyzed: slob dpon ci 'dra blta zhe na //

analyzed: de nyid rtag tu rdo rje 'chang //

analyzed: de ni ye shes rgya mtsho che //

analyzed: yid bzhin nor bu rin chen bzhin //

analyzed: slob dpon gyi ni yon tan gzung //
